replies.body:
same now that immunity is gone
but i would of preferred immunity to win
Can you get tickets to this?
Unfortunately no, the new studio doesn't have a live audience section. It would be awesome though, hopefully one day! Gotta spread the word about the OPL and get more people into it!
what is the date of this years wildcard invitational ?

The winner of OPL Split 1 goes to the International Wildcard Invitational in Turkey. The winner of that then goes to the MSI in NA - hopefully it will be an OCE team :) It's not the same thing as last year's one at Gamescom. You can read about the new MSI here - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-event/introducing-new-mid-season-invitational

The winner of OPL Split 2 goes to the Wildcard Qualifier for a spot at Worlds.
By the looks of the picture i think it should say: "Who will win the right to represent" Asiania not Oceania
Oceania DOES Incluce New Zealand, Indonesia, Papua New Guinea etc. It was never just Australia to begin with.
he said asiania not Australia haha
I don't know about DW, but Raydere is the only asian in the Chiefs lineup.
I hope Chiefs win this because they really do seem like they're still a fair way ahead of the rest of the scene and I'd like to see the strongest team from our region to represent us!
What do the winners of MSI get? An extra spot at worlds for their region or is it just a friendly thing?
